In England, in the seven days to 20 June, there were 59,234 new confirmed cases (104.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 13 June, there were 43,680 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 36% (15,554 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 25 June is 4,092,346 (7,236.7 cases per 100,000 population).
